赴.definition: to go; to visit (e.g. another country); to attend (a banquet etc)

赴任.definition: to travel to take up a new post

赴湯蹈火.definition: lit. to jump into scalding water and plunge into raging fire (idiom); fig. to brave any danger; to go to any lengths (for a noble cause)

赴美.definition: to go to the United States

赴考.definition: to go and sit an examination
